Class DiscountDecorator

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.DiscountDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlatDiscount, PercentageDiscount
public abstract class DiscountDecorator extends Object implements ProductComponent

An abstract class that serves as a decorator for applying discounts onto ProductComponent objects. Implements the ProductComponent interface.

Author:
Denis Ziegler, Benjamin Carver
